title: [娱乐]PlayerParticles —— 让你的VIPer周围火花四溅[1.7.9 - 1.12.2]
author: Nipo
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Nipo 于 2018-1-26 15:56 编辑 
插件描述
VIP专属插件，可以让玩家的身边产生各种粒子特效，不必多说，这款粒子特效插件最大的优势在于各版本通吃，最最最重要的是，这个插件能在固定的地方产生粒子特效，直接成地标有没有？
插件指令
/pp effects - 显示你拥有的粒子特效
/pp effect <args> - 设置粒子特效
/pp styles - 显示粒子特效的style
/pp style <args> - 设置粒子特效的效果
/pp data <args> - 设置数据？应该用不到
/pp reset - 重置粒子特效
/pp reset <playerName> - 重置其他玩家的粒子特效
/pp fixed - 固定粒子特效
/pp fixed create <x> <y> <z> <effect> <style> [data] - 在某个位置产生固定的粒子特效
/pp fixed remove <id> - 移除固定在某处粒子特效，根据id
/pp fixed list - 显示所有的固定的粒子特效
/pp fixed info <id> - 获得固定的粒子特效的信息
/pp fixed clear <radius> - 清除一定范围内所有固定的粒子特效
/pp version - 显示版本
/pp worlds - 显示禁用粒子特效的世界
/pp help - 显示帮助复制代码插件权限
和指令对应着看，我就不翻译了
playerparticles.* - Allows full access to effects, styles, and fixed effects
playerparticles.forcereset - Allows a player to force clear another player's effect, style, and data
Note: playerparticles.* does not grant permission to the following:

playerparticles.forcereset
playerparticles.fixed.unlimited
playerparticles.fixed.clear
Particle Permissions:
playerparticles.effect.* - Gives access to all particle types
playerparticles.effect.<effectName> - Effect names are listed in /pp list
Ex. playerparticles.effect.driplava Will give the player permission to use /pp effect driplava
Style Permissions:
playerparticles.style.* - Gives access to all style types
playerparticles.style.<styleName> - Style names are listed in /pp styles
Ex. playerparticles.style.orbit Will give the player permission to use /pp style orbit
Fixed Effect Permissions:

playerparticles.fixed - Gives access to all regular fixed effect commands, except the following:
playerparticles.fixed.unlimited - Allows a player to exceed the maximum set fixed effect limit
playerparticles.fixed.clear - Allows a player to remove ALL fixed effects within a given radius复制代码配置文件
有时间补上吧，先搬为敬
